author: Ella Ceron
title: Barack Obama Formally Endorses His Old Vice President, Joe Biden
description: Former President Barack Obama has finally weighed in on the 2020 race. On Tuesday (April 14), he formally endorsed his vice president, Joe Biden, who stands to be the presumptive Democratic nominee. In a video message posted to Biden's YouTube page, the 44th …
content:
Former President Barack Obama has finally weighed in on the 2020 race. On Tuesday (April 14), he formally endorsed his vice president, Joe Biden, who stands to be the presumptive Democratic nominee.
